      public Move makeAMove(int currRow, int currCol, int desRow, int desCol, String who)
      Make a move and notify the observer
      Parameters:
      currRow - The row of the piece we want to move
      currCol - The column of the piece we want to move
      desRow - The row we want to move this piece to
      desCol - The column we want to move this piece to
      who - Who is calling this method
      Returns:

    • getRandomMove

      public Move getRandomMove(ChessColor color)
      Generate a random valid move for the AI This AI can't do castle, en passant, or promotion
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the controller
      Returns:
      The move we found (null if none valid)
